item.title: Moving To Hugo
item.description: If I was to look at the internet archive wayback machine I could hand on heart say I’ve never had a personal website I’ve ever really been happy with. I’m not a designer, and I’m fine with that. Aside from that I’ve never really found a platform that I gel with. I had static html and I liked it, but with all developers I didn’t like the manual process of FTP’ing to a server, along with maintaining links, URL’s etc.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: So, after countless promises over the past few years, here we are! I’ve finally got round to sorting out my new site, it’s now running on Jekyll and is an absolute breeze to keep up to date.
